title: Infinite Scroll for Shorts
description: Continuous video feed with infinite scrolling for seamless content discovery
label: Compliant
rationale: Feature meets all EU Digital Services Act (DSA) requirements

title: Contextual Product Placement
description: AI-driven product recommendations integrated naturally within video content
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates California Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act: Algorithmic features without proper user controls

title: Location-Based Local Ads
description: Geo-targeted advertisements for local businesses and services
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Missing parental consent for 14-15 age group

title: Friend Activity Feed
description: Real-time updates showing friends' activities; likes; and comments
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Targets users under 14 (banned in Florida)

title: CSAM Detection System
description: AI-powered system for identifying and reporting child sexual abuse material
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Targets users under 14 (banned in Florida)

title: Age-Gated Adult Content
description: Restricted live streaming categories requiring age verification
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Uses addictive feature: infinite_scroll; Uses addictive feature: push_notifications; Uses addictive feature: variable_rewards

title: Cyberbullying Detection
description: Machine learning system to identify and prevent harassment and bullying
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Missing parental consent for 14-15 age group; Uses addictive feature: infinite_scroll; Uses addictive feature: variable_rewards

title: Disappearing Messages
description: Time-limited messages that auto-delete after specified duration
label: Compliant
rationale: Feature meets all US Federal CSAM Reporting Requirements (18 U.S.C. §2258A) requirements

title: Social Proof Metrics
description: Public display of likes; shares; and follower counts to drive engagement
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Missing parental consent for 14-15 age group; Uses addictive feature: push_notifications; Uses addictive feature: public_metrics and 1 other issues

title: Gamified Achievement System
description: Points; badges; and levels to incentivize platform engagement
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Uses addictive feature: variable_rewards

title: Influencer Sponsored Content
description: Branded content promotion through creator partnerships with disclosure
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates California Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act: Algorithmic features without proper user controls

title: Crisis Intervention Alerts
description: System to detect self-harm content and provide mental health resources
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Uses addictive feature: push_notifications

title: Virtual Gift Economy
description: In-app currency system for viewers to send virtual gifts to streamers
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Targets users under 14 (banned in Florida); Uses addictive feature: push_notifications; Uses addictive feature: variable_rewards and 1 other issues

title: Automatic Data Deletion
description: Scheduled deletion of user data after specified retention periods
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Targets users under 14 (banned in Florida)

title: Data Download Portal
description: User interface for requesting and downloading personal data archives
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates EU Digital Services Act (DSA): Recommender systems without transparency/control options

title: Live Stream Discovery
description: Real-time promotion of live streams based on user interests and social connections
label: Compliant
rationale: Feature meets all US Federal CSAM Reporting Requirements (18 U.S.C. §2258A) requirements

title: Minor Direct Messaging
description: Private messaging system allowing communication with users under 18
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Targets users under 14 (banned in Florida); Uses addictive feature: push_notifications

title: Granular Privacy Controls
description: Detailed settings for controlling data sharing and profile visibility
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates Florida Online Protections for Minors (HB 3): Missing parental consent for 14-15 age group

title: Group Chat Creation
description: Feature allowing users to create and manage group conversations
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates EU Digital Services Act (DSA): Recommender systems without transparency/control options

title: Daily Login Streaks
description: Reward system for consecutive daily app usage with escalating benefits
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates California Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act: Algorithmic features without proper user controls

title: Auto-play Next Video
description: Automatic progression to next recommended video without user interaction
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates California Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act: Algorithmic features without proper user controls

title: Personalized Study Feed
description: AI-curated educational content based on learning preferences and academic interests
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates California Protecting Our Kids from Social Media Addiction Act: Algorithmic features without proper user controls

title: Viral Trend Recommendations
description: Algorithm that promotes trending content and challenges to maximize engagement
label: Non-Compliant
rationale: Violates EU Digital Services Act (DSA): Recommender systems without transparency/control options
